org.drooms.impl.logic.facts

Class Worm

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.drooms.impl.logic.facts.Worm
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    Positioned

    public class Worm
extends Object
implements Positioned
    Represents type of fact to be inserted into the working memory, so that the strategy has information about the position of worms.
